product.txt_value: This is your cost for account purposes (not the selling price).

product.txt_reorderlevel: Add product to purchase order list if it's available amount goes below this number.
product.txt_replishment: Add product to bin replenishment if the bin's quantity goes below this number.
product.txt_is_full: This item has been counted in full
product.txt_tags: Press Enter to add a tag, before hitting update. Minimum of 3 characters.
product.txt_final_sale_item: This is a final sale item.
product.txt_dont_customs: Don't show this item on customs forms, even if it's in the order
product.txt_assembly_sku: This is an Assembly SKU used in Work Orders
